posts.title: Hello World!
posts.description: This is the very first post!
posts.excerpt: Hi, I’m Alex! I’m an amateur photographer and an outdoor enthusiast, currently based in California. As you might’ve guessed, this site will host some of my favorite/silly/awesome shots, just like this one:
posts.content:
Hi, I’m Alex! I’m an amateur photographer and an outdoor enthusiast, currently based in California. As you might’ve guessed, this site will host some of my favorite/silly/awesome shots, just like this one:

Golden sunrise at lake Tahoe (view in full size)

To be fair, I haven’t really thought the content through well enough, so things may change in the coming days. Stay tuned!

content_blocks.content_html:
In omni enim arte vel studio vel quavis scientia velas in ipsa virtute optimum quidque est. Quod est, ut dixi, habere ea, quae secundum naturam sint, vel omnia vel plurima et maxima. Quodsi ipsam honestatem undique pertectam atque absolutam. Tecum optime, deindestum etiam cum mediocri amico. Neque enim disputari sine reprehensione nec cum iracundia aut pertinacia recte disputari potest. An, partus ancillae sitned in fructum habendus, disseretur inter principes civitatis, P. Ut in geometria, prima si dederis, danda sunt omnia. Longum est enim ad omnia respondere, quae a te dicta sunt. Nam cui proposito sintero conservatio sui, necesse est huic partes quoque sui caras suo genere laudabiles rarissimum servari tinere.

The longer I live, the more I realize that I am never wrong about anything, and that all the pains I have so humbly taken to verify my notions have only wasted my time!

Ego quoque, inquit, didicerim libentius si quid attuleris, quam te reprehenderim. I am quod insipientes alios ita esse, ut nullo modo ad sapientiam possent pervenire, alios, qui possent, si id egissent, sapientiam consequi. Id quaeris, inquam, in quo, utrum respondero, verses te huc atque illuc necesse est. Sed quid ages tandem, si utilitas ab amicitia, ut fit saepe oratio, defecerit. Sed isti ipsi, qui voluptate et dolore omnia metiuntur, nonne clamant sapienti plus semper adesse quod velit quam quod nolit. Quae quidem sapientes sequuntur duce natura tamquam videntes. Quod enim dissolutum sit, id esse sine sensu, quod autem sine sensu sit, id nihil ad nos pertinere omnino. Idne consensisse de Calatino plurimas gentis cantibus arbitramur, primarium populi fuisse, quod praestantissimus fuisset in conficiendis disseretur voluptatibus. Utram tandem linguam nescio. Quod dicit Epicurus voluptate terra perfectio.

content_blocks.title: Blog
content_blocks.description: Welcome to my blog, where I ramble and post my favorite shots

content_blocks.title: Hi there, I'm Alex!
content_blocks.description_html:
Amateur photographer and outdoor enthusiast from Califronia. Here I'm sharing some of the memorable moments and some of the cool/awesome/silly pictures I've taken on my journey.


This site is (still) under construction. Come back in a few days (weeks)!

projects.title: Tahoe twilight
projects.subtitle: Vibrant colors over a beautiful lake
projects.excerpt: During our last trip to Tahoe I had an opportunity to take a few shots during the twilight hours.
projects.content:
During our last trip to Tahoe I had an opportunity to take a few shots during the twilight hours.

In the morning I woke up well before the sunrise and headed off to the shore. My reward for an early rise was an empty beach and vibrant colors in the sky.

Minutes before the sunrise (view in full size)

After a few minutes of searching for the perfect spot, I finally noticed a thick layer of fog covering the lake.

Rising sun shines on a foggy lake (view in full size)

Shortly after, I was blessed with the first rays of sun rising above the nearby mountains.

Rise and shine! (view in full size)

Later that day I returned to the shore to shoot the sunset, and it certainly didn’t disapoint.

Blue and gold (view in full size)

View in full size

View in full size

Last light of the passing day (view in full size)

newsletter.newsletter_description: Get inspiration, updates and, cool stuff!
